record.description: Asia Lecture Series at the University of Chicago 25 to 29 May 1949. The 25th annual institute of the Norman Wait Harris Memorial Foundation in International Relations dealt with Nationalism and Regionalism in South Asia. Here Brigadier General Carlos P. Romulo, Philippines representative to the United Nations, talks with Phillips Talbot, director of the 1949 Institute, and visiting assistant professor of political science.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Attached caption, Acme written on it.
